text: I recently moved here from Flint, I have to say that hungry Howie's here in ortonville is far superior to the stores in Flint. Much cleaner, much nicer, and the people are much smarter and more friendly.

text: Pizza was ready on time, hot and delicious. Staff very friendly.

name: Dennis Murphy
text: The food is up to standard with Howie's recipe, meaning great pizza. The staff are wonderful and excellent workers, and the owners are friendly if you happen to see them. Most visits are very general, easy-going pizza place encounters, however, great conversations can be had!

text: Exceptional customer service. Delivery is always on time. Over all a stupendous place to eat.

name: Ryan Moore
text: Staff were nice but nobody could figure out how to charge for the advertised sheet pizza deal. Coupon didn't made sense to them.

name: Kyana Thomas
text: The people who work here are great and always make sure everything is made right the first way!

text: It's Hungry Howies. They are all the same from what I can tell. The parking sucks there and Zero handicapped access but thats all the bad I can think of.
